Text: i cant get this game to install keeps asking for the setup-1.bin or something i keep directing it to the virtual drive but says still not found anyone else having dramas??

Yop mast, all working good for me :)
Mouted iso and installed thanks for the share!

@mastblast:
I used Alcohol 120% to mount iso file, started setup.exe and got message to insert disc 1 to continue installation. Then I copied all files from virtual drive to new folder, renamed setup-1.bin to install-1.bin, setup-2.bin to install-2.bin, and so on... When I started setup.exe, and got the same massage, but I redirected it to my new folder containing .bin files, and setup contiuned as normally. I think I'll stick with Razor 1911's version of the game, couse it just works.
